body.name: HOTLIFE LED Wireless Mouse, Slim Rechargeable Silent Portable USB Optical 2.4G Wireless Bluetooth Two Mode Computer Mice with USB Receiver and Type C Adapter (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 31 mins
features: 【Led Wireless Mouse】: This wireless mouse Bluetooth with lights can give you more fun during office time. You can choose use the 2.4G wireless mouse when the mouse botton switch is on the 2.4G mode,or connect your laptop's Bluetooth to use the Bluetooth mouse, easy to switch,suitable for any occasion.

【Silent Mouse Rechargeable】: Noiseless click, no worrying about disturbing others beside you, let you concentrate on work. Built-in durable rechargeable battery, it can be easily charged using the included USB cable. 2 hours charging, you can use it for 8-10 days..

【Back to Desktop Button & DPI Adjustable】: Two buttons are after the mouse scrool wheel, the M button makes you back to the laptop desktop to deal other things when you are Browsing the website. 3 adjustable DPI level s( 800, 1200, 1600) to change the speed and sensitivity of your laptop mouse cursor freely.

【Wide Compatibility Mouse Wireless】An accurate USB mouse with an working distance of up to 10 meters（33 feet） which can enables fast data transmission without delays or dropouts,fit for the computer micro usb and type c port, never think about the usb port. Well compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, and 10 / Vista / Windows ME Mac OS,Also support Bluetooth connection, this led wireless + bluetooth mouse perfectly fits for desktop, laptop, PC, Macbook, iPad and other Bluetooth devices.

【Portable Mouse and Operation Notice】 Slim and lightweight, Size : 4.52 in * 2.35 in * 0.78 in, durable ergonomic mouse is perfect for travel. The USB receiver is stored inside the back of the mouse. No need for a driver, Plug and Play! Automatic sleep mode and wake-up mode are installed to save energy. Pls Turn off the mouse LED light when not in use to expand the using life. ANY PROBLEM about the computer mice, you can contact us anytime.
body.description: These characteristics will be the reason why you choose us Stable wireless transmission distance up to 10 m. Plug and play, no delay or drop out. (USB receiver is stored in the bottom of the mouse) Colorful Light Design -- LED breathing light change alternately, lights up the mouse in dark, can add fun for work. Energy-saving, will enter the sleep mode for 8 -10 min when not using the bluetooth mouse,the laptop mouse can be worked by click any button. Accurate Tracking slim wireless mouse has 3 DPI level (800-1200-1600) to meet your different demands, experience smooth tracking on most surfaces. Slim ergonomic design and smooth frosted surface for an incredible user experience. And the symmetrical design allows it to fit right hands.

One-click return to desktop Easily return to the desktop without the need to click multiple times to shrink the window, which will improve your work efficiency. 3-Level DPI Adjustable The slim wireless mouse has three-level adjustable DPI, which can easily switch the pointer speed at any time to meet different needs. For example, when playing games, you need a suitable DIP to satisfy the experience. Two Connection Methods 2.4G wireless and Bluetooth connection to meet different needs. At the same time, it supports Type-c port devices. You can use this light up mouse whether your device is equipped with a USB port or a Type-C port.
Extensive Connection Support This type c wireless mouse Compatible with Windows, IOS, Microsoft, etc., suitable for mobile phones, desktops, laptops, PCs, Macbooks and other devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome mouse for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great mouse. So far works great, easy set up, love the lighting effects, super quite clicks, feels great in my hand and matches my color changing keyboard! Over all ..A+++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mouse
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is perfect for my workspace. I work in patient registration and I'm constantly moving to stations. I like that it fits in my small hand and I can maneuver it with ease. I also love the silent clicks. The connection to my desktop had no issues. My patients love the lights and it makes my area look cool...great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mouse, Amazing Price!
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace the original Lenovo Yoga mouse I got with my Yoga 920. That was the worst mouse I ever had. Instead of a thumbwheel, it had a pad that you slide your thumb on to move the mouse. Similar to the touch pad on a lap top. Except you had to get moving on the pad before anything happened. It was just about impossible to use. Then, the Yoga mouse would "sleep" if you didn't use it for, like, a minute. And when you moved it, nothing would happen. Sometime, moving it wasn't enough, I had to slam it on the table to get to do anything. The only thing good about was when you unfolded it was flat and would go nicely in your pocket. The battery finally failed. I wasn't thinking, and started to order a replacement, you know, because it was original equipment. But it was $65 bucks. For a bad mouse. So I got this instead. It has a thumbwheel, connects with bluetooth, etc., works REALLY GREAT and doesn't go to sleep. For $9. The other thing is when the Yoga went to sleep, the touch pad would wake up, and with my wrist on it the cursor would suddenly go off somewhere and I would be typing into the wrong place, or deleting what I just typed. Because this little guy DOESN'T GO TO SLEEP, as long as I am using it, the touch pad on the Lenovo is dead. It is the ideal combination. I know, it's all kind of little stuff, but I held off buying a different mouse because the horrible Yoga mouse was kinda working. I should have chucked long ago. You'll really like this mouse, and it IS slim enough to put in your pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars HOTLIFE LED Wireless Mouse is a functional and visually appealing computer accessory.
reviews.reviewText: The HOTLIFE LED Wireless Mouse is a practical and stylish computer accessory designed to enhance your computing experience. Combining functionality with visual appeal, this wireless mouse offers a range of features that cater to both work and leisure activities.Key features and benefits of the HOTLIFE LED Wireless Mouse:Wireless Connectivity: This mouse operates wirelessly, utilizing a USB dongle to connect to your computer or laptop. The wireless design reduces cable clutter and allows for greater freedom of movement.Ergonomic Design: The mouse is ergonomically shaped to fit comfortably in your hand, reducing the risk of wrist strain or discomfort during extended periods of use. The contoured design ensures a natural grip, making it suitable for both left- and right-handed users.LED Lighting: One of the standout features of this mouse is its LED lighting. It boasts a stylish and visually appealing design with LED lights that change colors while in use. This not only adds a touch of aesthetics to your workspace but also makes it easier to locate the mouse in dimly lit environments.Adjustable DPI: The mouse allows you to adjust the DPI (dots per inch) sensitivity levels. This feature is handy for tasks that require precision, such as graphic design or gaming. You can switch between different DPI settings to customize the cursor's speed and accuracy.Compatibility: The HOTLIFE LED Wireless Mouse is compatible with various operating systems, including Windows and macOS. It can be used with laptops, desktop computers, and even some tablets.Power-Saving Mode: To conserve battery life, the mouse has a power-saving mode that activates after periods of inactivity. This helps extend the life of the included batteries.Plug-and-Play: Setting up the mouse is a breeze. Simply plug the USB receiver into an available USB port on your computer, and the mouse should work without the need for additional drivers or software installations.Multiple Buttons: The mouse typically features multiple buttons, including the standard left and right buttons, as well as a clickable scroll wheel. Some models may include additional programmable buttons for customizable functions.In summary, the HOTLIFE LED Wireless Mouse is a functional and visually appealing computer accessory. Its wireless design, ergonomic shape, LED lighting, and adjustable DPI settings make it a versatile choice for both work and leisure tasks. Whether you're working on a project, browsing the web, or enjoying casual gaming, this mouse offers a reliable and stylish point-and-click solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The RGB is really pretty, smooth.
reviews.reviewText: The RGB is really pretty, and smooth. No stuttering, or sudden color changes.At first I thought it was broken, because I turned it on and was charging it, but only the front half of the LED ring was illuminated. It didn't illuminate the full ring of LED until it was connected (wifi or 2.4ghz) and in use.It has a full sleep mode as well, where it shuts off, and doesn't re-engage until you press one of the mouse buttons.It's motion is smooth, and the mouse feels good in the hand. It's rather light, but I believe a portable mouse shouldn't weigh too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, Great features, Great value Durable and dependable
reviews.reviewText: Hotlife Wireless Mouse: I previously bought 2 of the cheapest mouses I could find but they only lasted a very short time. This one works great, is rechargeable, and works via USB or WI-Fi. I'm not a gamer so I don't know how it would be for gaming. It's a great price for a dependable mouse with so many features. You can't go wrong with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like how it works and looks
reviews.reviewText: Works very well and I like the sleek look and the color. The only issue I have is the plugin to charge it. It does not want to fit into the port very well. I am afraid that it will break each time I try to insert it. I do not think it will last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable feel and sleek design
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is great. I use this for my home office and it is not bulky, very ergonomic and comfortable. Not to mention the color is really cool. Very smooth use and connection is stable and strong. Easy to install on my PC, my 12 year old did it. I also love that it is lightweight.

reviews.reviewTitle: I recently purchased the LED Wireless Mouse, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance.
reviews.reviewText: This mouse has quickly become an indispensable tool for my daily computing needs. Here are the reasons why I'm giving it a 5-star review:Slim and Stylish Design: The slim and sleek design of this mouse not only looks great but also feels incredibly comfortable in my hand. It's a perfect blend of form and function, making it a pleasure to use.Wireless Convenience: The wireless functionality is a game-changer. No more tangled wires cluttering up my workspace.The convenience of being able to move the mouse freely without being tethered to my computer is a significant plus.Silent Clicks: The silent click feature is fantastic. It's a huge improvement over traditional mice that can be noisy, especially in quiet environments. I can work late at night without disturbing anyone around me.Rechargeable Battery: The built-in rechargeable battery is a standout feature. I no longer need to worry about constantly replacing batteries. Charging is quick and easy via USB, and the battery life is impressive, lasting me for days on a single charge.Dual Connectivity: I appreciate the dual connectivity options—Bluetooth and 2.4G wireless. This versatility allows me to connect the mouse to multiple devices effortlessly. Switching between devices is seamless, which is incredibly convenient for multitasking.Responsive and Precise: The optical sensor in this mouse is highly responsive and precise. It glides smoothly on various surfaces, providing an excellent user experience for tasks like graphic design and gaming.LED Illumination: The LED lighting adds a cool touch to the mouse. It's not only aesthetically pleasing but also functional as it indicates the battery status, eliminating any surprises when the battery is running low.Portable and Travel-Friendly: This mouse is incredibly portable. Its compact size makes it easy to slip into a laptop bag or even a pocket, making it an excellent travel companion.Affordable Price: Given the quality and features, the price of this mouse is quite reasonable. It offers a lot of value for the cost.In conclusion, the LED Wireless Mouse is a top-notch peripheral that has greatly improved my computing experience. It's comfortable, silent, and packed with features that cater to both productivity and aesthetics. I wholeheartedly recommend this mouse to anyone in need of a reliable and stylish input device for their computer. It's a 5-star product all the way.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty, really silent, not sure how durable
reviews.reviewText: The colors are really pretty and not disturbing, the setup with laptop is automatic, works fine, the clicking is really silent, the only potential issue is the surface - not sure how long it would last, looks like it might be peeling off or losing color quickly (but so far so good).

This product is great! The LED works very well and the clicking isn't bad. It's easy to carry and fits well in any type of bag. They give all necessary cables and USB connection devices and it's easy to use.Few nitpicks, the infrared light for the mouse sometimes can be seen through the LED lights, but it doesn't bother much. There's only one USB connection device do if you lose it you're stuck with Bluetooth. The scrolling wheel is quite hard to press for clicking, but it scrolls well. The buttons in the middle are useful, but aren't that easy to reach when operating thr mouse.Aside from these tiny complaints, it's an amazing product! Avid recommendation if you don't have the budget for a higher quality mouse.
I like the low profile and lights which looks very good. I've only tried it on the Bluetooth mode. It paired very quickly to my Firestick 4K.Great value
After 1.5 years, bluetooth still works, but 2.4ghz Receiver is dead. Tried it on many computers, not working. Used to work like a charm.
